column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=White Lotus sentry says : " You know the drill , Zaheer . "
#Text=Zaheer says : " Of course . "
#Text=White Lotus sentry says : " Hope you still like rice . "
#Text=Zaheer says : " Have you ever read the poetry of the great airbending guru , Laghima ? "
#Text=White Lotus sentry says : " What ? "
#Text=Zaheer says : " Guru Laghima lived four thousand years ago in the Northern Air Temple .
#Text=With something you picked up from an old airbender children 's story ?
#Text=" Zaheer says : " Like all great children 's tales , it contains truth within the myth .
#Text=Laghima once wrote : " Instinct is a lie , told by a fearful body , hoping to be wrong . "
#Text=" White Lotus sentry says : " What 's that supposed to mean ?
#Text=" Zaheer says : " It means that when you base your expectations only on what you see , you blind yourself to the possibilities of a new reality .
#Text=" Zaheer says : " Uh , uh , uh .
#Text=You would n't want to singe your friend , would you ?
#Text=" White Lotus sentry says : " How ?
#Text=You 're not a ... bender .
#Text=" Zaheer says : " Nature is constantly changing .
#Text=Like the wind .
#Text=" Zaheer says : " Now you might want to ration that bowl of rice .
#Text=You 've got three weeks until the next shift change .
#Text=It 's the dawning of a new age .
#Text=The end of the White Lotus , and soon , the end of the Avatar .

#Text=" Main Asami Sato Bolin Bumi Daw Korra Lin Beifong Mako Tenzin Antagonists Zaheer says : " Minor Daw 's brother Fruithog Ikki Jinora Kya Meelo Pema President Raiko Rohan White Lotus sentries " Shiro Shinobi says : " It 's brother versus brother in the war of the Water Tribes .
#Text=After Korra discovered that Chief Unalaq betrayed her and her father , she turned against him , sparking civil war .
#Text=The Southern rebels rallied around Tonraq , but they are vastly outnumbered , so Korra is headed to Republic City to seek aid .
#Text=But will she be able to convince President Raiko to send troops to help the South ?
#Text="
